name: Cyble
long_description:
To reimagine cybersecurity with an AI-native platform that unifies detection, protection and remediation across the digital attack surface

Headquartered in Alpharetta, Georgia, and with offices in Australia, Malaysia, Singapore, Dubai, Saudi Arabia and India, Cyble has a global presence. To learn more about Cyble, visit www.cyble.com.
one_liner: Cyble - World’s First Intelligence-Driven, AI-Native Security…
